H0.text: Which huge global communications brand is derived from a local word for a marten. Samsung

H1.text: Which huge global communications brand is derived from a local word for a marten. Huawei

H2.text: Which huge global communications brand is derived from a local word for a marten. Ericsson

H3.text: Which huge global communications brand is derived from a local word for a marten. Nokia

A4.text: According to Samsung's founder, the meaning of the Korean hanja Samsung (三星) is three stars.

A5.text: Samsung Electronics is a multinational electronics and information technology company headquartered in Suwon and the flagship company of the Samsung Group.

A6.text: The Finnish communications company Nokia derives its name, via the river Nokianvirta, from a type of marten locally known as the nokia.
